entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Murdochville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:58 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Murdochville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 20 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind south 20 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 22 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then clearing. Blowing snow. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 60 gusting to 80 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 22 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 28. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Windy. High minus 17. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 25. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 14. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 14. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
